nodes.text: El-Les was a male Arcona bounty hunter who was active during the Clone Wars, and was hired by the Galactic Republic to train clone cadets on Kamino, along with the Siniteen Bric, who also was a bounty hunter.

During the Clone Wars, El-Les was hired with the Siniteen Sergeant Bric by the Galactic Republic to train clone cadets on Kamino. Bric and El-Les often worked together, yet their attitudes on the cadets often clashed.

El-Les was regarded as compassionate for a bounty hunter, and wished his trainees to do well. This compassionate attitude often clashed with his partner Bric. Unlike most members of his species, El-Les did not fall prey to the temptation of salt, as indicated by the color of his eyes, which would have turned yellow had he become addicted.
El-Les was voiced by Nolan North.
